plot: Mark is uncertain about being best man at Super Hans' wedding, until he discovers Dobby is invited. Meanwhile, Jeremy's life coaching career is taking off but leads to a surprising encounter.

Mistrustful of Jeremy as a lodger Mark installs a secret camera and is amazed to discover him with a gay lover Jo. Dobby returns from New York but, sadly for Mark, with a boyfriend, Gregory, who accuses Mark of stalking her. They all travel to East Anglia for Super Hans' wedding - where Jeremy gives a liberating best man speech and Hans' real name is revealed as Simon.—don @ minifie-1
